mapper.select: select pfl.financing_time_year from investment_institutions_project iip left join projects p on iip.project_id = p.ID left join project_financing_log pfl on iip.project_id = pfl.project_id where iip.investment_institutions_id = #{institutionId} and pfl.financing_time_year is not null group by pfl.financing_time_year order by pfl.financing_time_year desc

select ps.segmentation_name,ms.segmentation_logo ,count(*) ct from investment_institutions_project iip left join project_financing_log pfl on iip.project_id = pfl.id left join projects p on pfl.project_id = p.id right join project_segmentation ps on p.id = ps.project_id left join meta_segmentation ms on ps.segmentation_name = ms.name where iip.investment_institutions_id = #{institutionId} group by ps.segmentation_name order by ct desc
